meanings.definition: A restaurant in which customers serve themselves from a variety of dishes displayed on a counter or table.
meanings.sent1: In the cafeteria, I picked out a sandwich and some fruit for lunch.
meanings.sent2: The cafeteria at the mall offers a wide selection of food for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: When I accidentally dropped my tray in the cafeteria, it caused a bit of a mess.
meanings.sent4: The cafeteria was a treasure trove of culinary delights waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cookies in the cafeteria was irresistible.

meanings.definition: A dining area in a school or office where meals are served to customers who serve themselves.
meanings.sent1: During lunchtime, students gather in the cafeteria to eat and chat.
meanings.sent2: The office cafeteria is a popular spot for employees to grab a quick bite.
meanings.sent3: When the cafeteria ran out of dessert, there was a mini uproar among the diners.
meanings.sent4: The school cafeteria became a bustling hub of activity during lunch breaks.
meanings.sent5: The cafeteria buzzed with energy as people lined up to get their meals.
